reviewText: One of the best hot body DVDs. Karissa has two hot scenes. All the women are hot.

2. Debi is from Costa Mesa, California. Debi is wearing a red with yellow design bra and shorts. The bra comes off quickly, while the short comes off several moments later.

3. Andrea is from Pasadena, California and is wearing a short, tight, and black police outfit with high boots.

4. Renee Ryan is from Detroit, Michigan and wears a white top and short. The top comes off quickly while the shorts come off a few moments later.

5. Karissa is from northern California and wears a white shirt with green shorts. Karissa is half Italian and half Pilipino.

6. Liz Leighton is from Pennsylvania and is wearing a silver\gray top and short.

7. Tanya Danielle is from Las Angles, California is wearing a gold top and short. Tanya Danielle has big breasts.

8. Bambi is from Scottsdale, Arizona and is wearing a black top and short. The top comes off right away while the short take awhile.

Almost all the ladies are ask what it takes to get them on the first date. At the end of the contest we see all eight ladies once again and then the final five are introduced. The winner gets to strips for us one last time. The only thing I hate about this video is the annoying announcer. The ladies could have done a better job speaking for them selves. Hot Body Competition: Beverly Hills Short Shorts Contest gets an AAAAA+++++.
